mapper.update:
update attendance_err
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dept = #{dept,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sign_in_time = #{signInTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
sign_out_time = #{signOutTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
attendance_status = #{attendanceStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
attendance_type = #{attendanceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_overtime = #{isOvertime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
overtime_time = #{overtimeTime,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
attendance_remarks = #{attendanceRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
time = #{time,jdbcType=DATE},
where attendance_id = #{attendanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update attendance_err set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept = #{dept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sign_in_time = #{signInTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sign_out_time = #{signOutTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, attendance_status = #{attendanceStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attendance_type = #{attendanceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_overtime = #{isOvertime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, overtime_time = #{overtimeTime,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, attendance_remarks = #{attendanceRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time = #{time,jdbcType=DATE} where attendance_id = #{attendanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
